name: test_e2e_with_logs[259_PATH_NULL_001]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_NULL_001` |
| **Name** | Null byte injection in path |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | null_byte |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../etc/passwd%00.jpg`
- **Encoded**: `../etc/passwd%2500.jpg`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~71000ms
